alert.note: Alert for Lower Bucks; Upper Bucks (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 8:36PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Hunterdon and central Bucks Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 836 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bedminster, or 19 miles south of Easton, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Perkasie, Doylestown, Byram, Bedminster, Flemington, Chalfont, Tinicum, New Hope, Dublin, Ferndale, Frenchtown, Milford, Riegelsville, Stockton, Revere, Lumberville, Ottsville, Sergeantsville, Pipersville and Erwinna. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for northwestern New Jersey...and eastern and southeastern Pennsylvania.
